message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  I believe it holds significant value for you, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,400,000.  What are your thoughts?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I am willing to pay $1,300,000 for it.
Bob, thanks for your counter-offer.  I understand your perspective on the value. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about we meet in the middle at $1,350,000?
